text: Hagi ana knafima rama'a vahe'ma ome forehu hakarema huta ana mopafima mani avi'matesanuta, Nagri huhagerafi huvempage vogisima ko'ma knare knafima tamagranema me'nea zankura tamagesa antahi atresageno ovugahie. Ana vogisigura tamagesa ontahi tamagane kaninemita onkegahaze. Ana nehutma ru'enena huhagerafi huvempage vogisia kasefara trora osugahaze huno Ra Anumzamo'a hu'ne.
